setting.openApiKey.desc:
You can login first and then use your own key.

1. Sign up for the [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/signup).
2. Create a new secret key in [Settings â†’ API keys](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).
3. Copy and paste your API key here:
